newsitem.title: USA: MBIA qualifies 11 issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: MBIA qualifies 11 issues for bond insurance.

text.p: MBIA Insurance Co said it has qualified for bond insurance the following 11 municipal issues scheduled for competitive sale today.
--Florida Municipal Power Agency, $57.66 million refunding revenue bonds, direct purchase.
--Lawrence School Building, Ind., $12.95 million first mortgage bonds.
--Louisville Met Swr, Ky., $51.325 million sewer bonds. direct purchase.
--Katonah-Lewisboro S.D., N.Y., $12.5 million school district bonds.
--Morrisville CSD, N.Y., $5.05 million school district GOs.
--Pearl River UFSD, N.Y., $5.9 million school district bonds.
--Timber Lane, Util., Texas, $2 million waterworks and sewer system bonds.
